Method Detail

addDataTypeChoice

com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasClickHandlers addDataTypeChoice(java.lang.String caption,
                                                                   boolean isDefault)
Adds a data type choice to the view.

Parameters:
caption - The caption for this data type choice.
isDefault - Flag indicating whether or not this is the default choice.
Returns:
The click event handlers associated with the data type choice.
